In 2017, the
Salix database was created in order to store floristic information for the Middle Volga Region. The database contains records of all plant species growing in the area of the study. Each entry contains a link to a literary source or a herbarium specimen confirming the findings. The publication of the synopsis of alien plant species in the Middle Volga Region ( Senator and Vasjukov 2019) made it possible to highlight and identify the alien plant species.
